name: Azalea (Nyan)
description:
Azalea is a game about four friends and a stranger who moves into their town. The outcome of the story depends on your guidance and choices though! Up to five endings can be achieved~

Game features 10+ unique CGs, five different characters and 10+ different and detailed backgrounds! (I poured my whole heart into this project TvT)

That being said, the story, the character and the art all belongs to me (except that one bg with a fence because i made that from the materials available in ibis paint qwq)

BUT!! What isn´t mine is the music! Here´s a list of the tracks I used: 

  • Almost New
  • Sunshine
  • Pleasant Porridge
  • Magic Scout Nothern Glade
  • Autumn Day
  • Dreamer
  • Wounded
  • Fireflies and Stardust
  • Water Lily
  • Rainbows
  • On My Way

All by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com/)

Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

If there are any errors within the game, please let me know! This is my first game so any kind of advice or feedback is greatly appretiated

Made using tyranobuilder~

Thank you for coming by! Hope you days are filled with sunshine and Michi´s music hehe

Also, special hello to those who are here from my art acoount, ILY guys!!
